price: Basi wote wawili walipo jisalimisha, na akamlaza juu ya kipaji.
footnotes: Yule baba na mwanawe walipo iridhia hukumu ya Mwenyezi Mungu, na akamweka juu ya fungu la mchanga na akamlaza juu yake, kipaji chake kikawa juu ya ardhi, akawa tayari kumchinja.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
